text: Damsels in Distress is a 2011 American comedy movie. This movie is about a newly transferred college student who becomes friends with several other girls. Aubrey Plaza plays Debbie. The movie was given a high rating by Rotten Tomatoes. It was released in the United States in 2012. Category:2010s comedy movies Category:2011 movies Category:American independent movies
title: Damsels in Distress
